Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add canvas cache with sprite warmup and refactor Test section

- Add canvas cache system to MGSprite with LRU eviction for toCanvas results
- Add warmup\(\) function to preload sprites at startup for better performance
- Refactor bootstrap to warmup plant/pet sprites during loading
- Make HUD initialization async with yieldToMain\(\) to avoid blocking
- Refactor Test section to display all sprite categories with searchable tables
- Add persistent state for expanded cards, sort order, and search queries

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix HUD freeze by making initialization async with preloading

- Convert createHUD to async function with batched style injection
- Add preload system to BaseSection for background content generation
- Preload TestSection during mod loading to avoid freeze on tab switch
- Add yieldToMain delays between sprite table builds for smoother loading
- Use singleton pattern for TestSection to preserve preloaded content
